UPDATE SYS_TEST
test_bigint = #{test_bigint,jdbcType=bigint},
test_gibintn = #{test_gibintn,jdbcType=bigint},
test_char = #{test_char,jdbcType=char},
test_charn = #{test_charn,jdbcType=char},
test_date = #{test_date,jdbcType=date},
test_datetime = #{test_datetime,jdbcType=datetime},
test_decimal = #{test_decimal,jdbcType=decimal},
test_decimalp = #{test_decimalp,jdbcType=decimal},
test_decimalps = #{test_decimalps,jdbcType=decimal},
test_double = #{test_double,jdbcType=double},
test_doublemd = #{test_doublemd,jdbcType=double},
test_float = #{test_float,jdbcType=float},
test_floatp = #{test_floatp,jdbcType=float},
test_floatmd = #{test_floatmd,jdbcType=float},
test_int = #{test_int,jdbcType=int},
test_intn = #{test_intn,jdbcType=int},
test_time = #{test_time,jdbcType=time},
test_timestamp = #{test_timestamp,jdbcType=timestamp},
test_varcharn = #{test_varcharn,jdbcType=varchar},
tset_text = #{tset_text,jdbcType=text},
test_blob = #{test_blob,jdbcType=blob}
WHERE guid = #{guid}
